extendedInfo.description: ***This Android app is a FREE, massive library of video walkthroughs for tons of AAA games, right in the palm of your handâexpertly produced by Game Front.com, a top video game news and information site.***TOTALLY ONE OF A KINDGame Front's âVideo Walkthroughs, Game Guides & Cheatsâ app is the first and only FREE video walkthrough library available in the app store! It's a perfect, one-of-a-kind couch companion for any gamer. Updated daily, the app is packed with helpful videos showing: cheats, achievements, trophies, unlockables and full game walkthroughs for dozens of top AAA games like Skyrim, Black Ops 2 and Halo 4.     FIVE STAR QUALITYThe app has launched to rave reviews, earning it a stellar five-star rating! Gamers have praised the app for its slick interface, intuitive customizability and sheer size. Download now and see what you've been missing!  TIPS, HELP, HOW-TOâSâWITH PERSONALITY. Whether you need help finding collectibles, unlocking Achievements and Trophies or beating a tough boss, Game Front has you covered. Our team of pro gamers provide in-depth strategies full of helpful, humorous audio commentary. Our walkthroughs donât just help you winâtheyâre simply fun to watch. CUSTOMIZABLE EXPERIENCE The app is yours to customize and make your own. Feel free to add feeds for certain games or platforms to the home screen so you get just what you want. Only want PS3 games? Go for it! Obsessed with Skyrim? Youâre more than covered. Looking forward to 2012âs big releases? Stay tuned for video walkthroughs for: Halo 4, Black Ops 2, Assassinâs Creed 3, Hitman: Absolution and Far Cry 3! ALL THE VIDEOS IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND Over 3,000 walkthrough videos, for all your favorite games! Now you can conveniently load our walkthroughs on your phone without ever leaving the couch. ITâS FREE! That says it all right there, doesnât it? You donât owe us anything for downloading the app. Itâs free and always will be.Enjoy, and game on! Keywords: game walkthrough, cheats, trophies, achievements, skyrim dragonborn, assassins creed 3, halo 4, black ops 2, game guide, unlockables, game cheats, far cry 3, hitman absolution**** Note: since this is a video streaming app and will require lots of data to download, we strongly recommend that youâre connected to Wi-Fi for the best possible experience.

reviews.title: Just an awesome app
reviews.comment: Dont think you can beat this app its free, has all the awesome walkthroughs from all the game front team. Had it since the day it was released and no problems. Can add which ever walkthroughs you want to your home page. There are just no reasons not to get this app. Well done to all the gamefront team on this awesome app. No problems in giving it a full 5 stars!
reviews.author: Justin Alexander

reviews.title: Very Impressed!
reviews.comment: Great app and it has features similar to Pulse (news feed). My only suggestion would be to have all your videos on this app and a banner ad system to help support it.
reviews.author: Colton Fouts

reviews.title: Good but not complete
reviews.comment: Personalize page is an unbeatable feature, but searching through video walkthroughs for a game is not easy and no link to the gamefront web page.

reviews.title: It\'s Execellent
reviews.comment: Could you guys possibly put in more game walthroughs such as Peace walker, MGS4, Etc.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This app is truly awesome, each time I use it I find another reason why to love it

reviews.comment: This app does not work, it force close every dam time I try to open it!!! 0 out 5 stars if it was possible!

reviews.title: Beats the YouTube app for ease of use
reviews.comment: I\'d give it 5/5 if some things gets fixed.  My Problem  1.   The Dragon\'s Dogma w/ James series, which showed me this app, has only 3 random parts on this app.  Parts 2, 4, and 14.   I don\'t mind that there are only 3 at the moment, but at least upload them in order.  An improvement:  2.  You could add playlists, where a Let\'s Play will play itself to completion if you let it.  Automatically playing part 2 at the end of Part 1, and so on.   This would really just be a luxury, of course.
reviews.author: Will Rosener

reviews.title: Full screen?
reviews.comment: I can barley see a thing with this small window..   but it is good and easy to use.  @breakmedia, yes it was set on off and I feel dumb for.not knowing that. Thank you
reviews.author: Rahman Nada

reviews.title: Game walk threws
reviews.comment: Keep them coming. Helps out a lot when you don\'t have the book, also when you get in a spot and don\'t know what to do next. Recommend to all gamers.
